Description: Electrode location details for the recording session.

name.Description: Electrode (EEG, EOG, and ECG) labels. EEG labels are according to the cap montage.

EEGInfo.Description: EEG electrodes placed according to the international 10–20 system.

EOGInfo.Description: EOG electrode placement: EOG_HR: right side of the right eye; EOG_HL: left side of the left eye; EOG_VA: above the right eye; EOG_VB: below the right eye.

ECGInfo.Description: ECG electrode placement: ECG on the left side of chest

RefGndInfo.Description: Reference electrode (Ref) was placed on the right earlobe, and ground electrode (Gnd) was placed on the left earlobe.
RefGndInfo.Notes: No location coordinate details are provided for Ref and Gnd electrodes.

x.Description: Cartesian X coordinate (to nose) for the electrode.

y.Description: Cartesian Y coordinate (to left ear) for the electrode.

z.Description: Cartesian Z coordinate (to vertex) for the electrode.

sph_radius.Description: Real distance from head center for the electrode.

sph_theta.Description: Spherical elevation angle (real degrees) for the electrode. Positive = Rotating from nose (0) toward left ear.

sph_phi.Description: Real distance from head center for the electrode. Positive = Rotating from horizontal (0) upwards.

theta.Description: Theta angle (polar coordinate, in degrees). Positive values rotate from the nose (0°) toward the left ear.

radius.Description: Radius in polar coordinates (real, unitless). 0.5 corresponds to the head disk radius and is used as the plotting limit in topoplot().
